item.title: Flight Deck Vent Fan – Without Draw Through Smoke Detection System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Flight Deck Window Heater Systems (No. 1 and No. 2) are operative.

numlitem.para: Flight Deck Window Heater Systems No. 1 and No. 2 must be operative.

placard.para: Placard Flight Deck FAN switch "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
